import React, { Component } from 'react' import usPic from '../../images/us-pic.png' import profileGuilherme from '../../images/userProfileGuilherme.jpeg' import './css/style.css' import './css/animate.css' import './css/bootstrap.min.css' import './css/line-awesome.css' import './css/line-awesome-font-awesome.min.css' import './css/font-awesome.min.css' import './css/jquery.mCustomScrollbar.min.css' import './css/responsive.css' import './vendor/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css' import './lib/slick/slick.css' import './lib/slick/slick-theme.css' class Post extends Component { render(){ return(

{this.props.nome} | @{this.props.username}

  • Deletar

{this.props.conteudo}

  • {this.props.curtidas} Pessoas Curtiram
  • {this.props.comentarios} Comentários
) } } export default Post;
